scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n "VITE,SERVER,APP" -c "blue,green,magenta" "npm run dev" "npm run server" "cross-env SKIP_BACKEND=1 npm run electron"
scripts._dist_worker: node -e "const {execSync}=require('child_process'); const fs=require('fs'); if(!process.env.GH_TOKEN && fs.existsSync('.env')){ const env=fs.readFileSync('.env','utf8'); const match=env.match(/^GH_TOKEN=(.*)$/m); if(match) process.env.GH_TOKEN=match[1].trim(); } const c=parseInt(execSync('git rev-list --count HEAD').toString().trim()); const major=Math.floor(c/1000); const minor=Math.floor((c%1000)/100); const patch=c%100; const v=major+'.'+minor+'.'+patch; const b=execSync('git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD').toString().trim(); const pub = process.env.PUBLISH_MODE || 'never'; console.log('--- ESTRATÉGIA DE DISTRIBUIÇÃO ---'); console.log('Versão:', v); console.log('Branch:', b); console.log('Publicar no GitHub:', pub === 'always' ? 'SIM' : 'NÃO'); console.log('----------------------------------'); execSync('npm run build', {stdio:'inherit'}); const builderCmd='electron-builder --publish ' + pub + ' -c.extraMetadata.version='+v+' -c.releaseInfo.releaseName=\"v'+v+'\" -c.nsis.artifactName=\"PSQL Buddy Setup v'+v+'-'+b+'.exe\"'; execSync(builderCmd, {stdio:'inherit', env: process.env})"
